mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon Mansion, Downstairs Chamber
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Unknown
Publisher--Ingersoll, Truman Ward (1862-1922)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of the downstairs chamber at Mount Vernon. The view includes room furnishings, fireplace, rug, and a barrier in the south doorway. 'No. 46' is written in the bottom left corner of the photograph. The printed photograph has been bound into a book with other photographs with a stamp on the back interior cover from 'Ingersoll.'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mansion interior
p Downstairs Chamber
